remixlab.bias.agent.profile

Class Profile<K extends Shortcut,A extends Action<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.agent.profile.Profile<K,A>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Shortcut
    A - Action : User-defined action.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClickProfile, KeyboardProfile, MotionProfile

    public class Profile<K extends Shortcut,A extends Action<?>>
extends Object
implements Copyable
    A mapping between Shortcuts and user-defined Actions, implemented as a parameterized hash-map wrap.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Profile()
      Constructs the hash-map based profile.

      • handle

        public Action<?> handle(BogusEvent event)
        Main class method which attempts to define a user-defined action by parsing the event's shortcut.
        Parameters:
        event - BogusEvent i.e., Action event to be parsed by this profile.
        Returns:
        The user-defined action. May be null if no actions was found.
